Experience and Competence

Summary

Five year Well Engineer with experience in Design and Operations roles delivering value in North and South American Unconventional plays. Aiming to continue to build experience in Well Design in a variety of basins. Concurrently pursuing a Masters degree in Computer Science to implement digitilization in oil and gas, and to change the world for the better through exerting a positive influence and adding value to society.

作为一位五年经验的工程师，我已做过几个成功的大项目。我学计算机和变成是因为我有 一个目标，追求和梦想利用大数据来帮助社会，提供所有人的生活水平。
